pageContext.claim: “People have their 401(k)s and they have all of the different investments and they have stock in companies and lots of other things and real estate and houses. If they won, their houses will be worthless. Their 401(k)s will go down 90 percent. They'll go down to nothing.”
pageContext.analysis: The stock market rose higher under Obama than Trump, so the president has no basis to claim that if Democrats won, stocks and retirement plans would lose more than 90 percent of their value.
